text: @realDonaldTrump America arises this morning. Lead prosecutors on Flynn case resigned. Bill Barr demand they drop all guilty pleas Flynn admitted too! Then were given House Intel Report on Trump's collusion with Russia to cheat America. Coronavirus, 76,000 dead Americans. Trump, babbling swamp.
